name: Jewel Heist
description:
Jewel Heist is an entry to the 2021 GameDevTV game jam!

This project is a team entry between myself and @SeanGollos of https://golly-games.itch.io/

NOTE: PC Download looks better due to 2D Shadow support. WebGL version lacks shadows & lighting (all items fully lit)

Requires a 1080p resolution or higher. If you play in web player please set for fullscreen or you may cut off part of the edges of the scenes.

Description

They said it couldn't be done. Five jewelry stores in one night? Impossible. Well after casing the block for weeks, the night has finally arrived. You'll have to work fast, but be careful not to make any mistakes. The police response time for the area is only a couple minutes. Good luck!

Instructions

  • Click on the store to walk up to it. Click the door to zoom in, then click the lock to start picking.
  • Once inside the store, click on a jewelry case to get a better look at it's contents, or click on the lock to start picking.
  • Once the lock has been picked, click each item to put it in your bag.
  • Click the empty case to zoom back out and choose another case.
  • Make sure you grab as much as you can before you leave, because once you do, there's no going back!

Lockpicking

  • Insert your lockpick into the tumbler. Be careful not to touch the sides or you'll alert the police.
  • Move the lockpick with WASD or ARROW keys
  • The pins of each lock must be pushed up in a specific order. Push up the correct pin, it will lock into place. Push up the incorrect pin, and the lock will reset.

Avoiding Getting Caught

  • If you touch your lockpick against the metal of the tumbler, the police will be alerted.
  • Listen for audio clues to get an idea of how close the police are.
  • Be sure to click the "getaway" button to safely escape with your loot before the cops arrive.
  • If the cops catch you, you lose.
